concept.title: 529.401-70 Purchases at or under the simplified acquisition threshold.

conbody.p: Insert 552.229-70, Federal, State, and Local Taxes, in purchases and contracts estimated to exceed the micropurchase threshold, but not the simplified acquisition threshold.
